actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to limit the amount of funds held by fiduciaries of incompetent veterans subject to inheritance by nondependent heirs.
short_title: Veterans' Nondependent Heirs Inheritance Limitation Act of 1990

summary.text: Veterans' Nondependent Heirs Inheritance Limitation Act of 1990 - Provides that, in any case in which a veteran having neither spouse, child, nor dependent parent is receiving disability compensation, is rated by the Department of Veterans Affairs as incompetent, and has an estate of $25,000 or more, further payments of compensation shall not be made until the estate is reduced to $10,000. Provides for lump-sum payment to a veteran six months after a finding of competency of amounts held back due to the provisions of this Act, unless death or returned incompetency occurs before the required date of such payment.

titles.title: Veterans' Nondependent Heirs Inheritance Limitation Act of 1990
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to limit the amount of funds held by fiduciaries of incompetent veterans subject to inheritance by nondependent heirs.
